detailsData.title: Early Intervention
detailsData.content: By getting to work immediately, often we can locate favorable defense evidence and witnesses, and get a 'head start' towards defeating the charges.

detailsData.title: Insider Knowledge
detailsData.content: Our team includes former prosecutors and career police officers. We use this insider knowledge to your advantage in fighting your criminal charges.

detailsData.title: Personal Contact
detailsData.content: We put a premium on the accessibility of our criminal defense lawyers and support staff. We are here to provide moral and emotional support as well as legal representation.

detailsData.title: Private Investigation
detailsData.content: Our private defense investigators are former career police officers. Now their job is to find evidence that will benefit you.

valueProp: Shouse Law Group represents victims throughout the U.S. who suffered serious complications and injuries from dangerous drugs and failed medical devices. Our California criminal defense attorneys handle misdemeanor, felony, DUI, and juvenile cases throughout Los Angeles, San Bernardino, Ventura, Riverside, San Diego, Orange County, Sacramento, and the San Francisco Bay Area.

testimonalData.text: Shouse Law Group has wonderful customer service. They were so pleasant and knowledgeable when I contacted them.
testimonalData.author: Dee M.
